post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFire Media was challenged by BBDO to produce banner ads for their client, AT&T. The banners featured a carousel of smartphones that are aimed at B2B markets.

Execution:

CFM built, animated and distributed six rich-media, expandable banners. Each unit featured an interactive carousel of different smartphones that run on the AT&T network as well as messaging that drove users to the AT&T site.
post_detail.title: Carousel Banners
